Package com.example.chinesecheckers.models

Class BoardModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.chinesecheckers.models.BoardModel
  • public class BoardModel
extends java.lang.Object
    Models a game board for Chinese Checkers Allows a simulation of the game by defining the boundry of the board, and making valid moves
